title: Manage Costume Rentals for a Period Drama
description: A TV production needs to rent several period-specific costumes from an external costume house.

tasks.description: Identify the required costumes and the rental dates based on the shooting schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of all needed costumes and the duration of the rental.

tasks.description: Contact the costume house to check availability and get a rental quote.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives a quote and confirmation of availability.

tasks.description: Process the rental agreement and schedule the pickup of the costumes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finalizes the rental and arranges for logistics.
